author: Maggie Pehanick
title: Taylor Swift and Zayn Malik Just Leaked Part of the Video For Their Fifty Shades Darker Song
text:
Taylor Swift and Zayn's "I Don't Wanna Live Forever" Video Taylor Swift and Zayn Malik Just Leaked Part of the Video For Their Fifty Shades Darker Song January 25, 2017 
â€” zayn (@zaynmalik) January 25, 2017 
Fifty Shades of Grey wouldn't be half as sexy without its sultry soundtrack , and it's looking like the same may be true for the sequel, Fifty Shades Darker . "I Don't Wanna Live Forever," Zayn Malik and Taylor Swift's track for the film, has been out since December (there's a lyric video and everything), but the official video is about to drop. Both artists teased the video via Instagram and Twitter, and fans are having mixed reactions. As a reminder, Swift dated Harry Styles, a member of One Direction. Malik controversially left One Direction to pursue a solo career. Conflict of interest? Perhaps, but that's not enough to stop them from playing love interests in this video. The full video drops Thursday at midnight (technically Friday morning), but you can see the sneak peeks here. A video posted by Taylor Swift (@taylorswift) on Jan 25, 2017 at 1:05pm PST Related:
